_header: For thyself man thou may see
Note:
Cf. 6097, and cf. Tilley (1950)
XTilley, Morris Palmer. A Dictionary of the Proverbs in England in the 16th and 17th Centuries. Ann Arbor, MI: University of Michigan, 1950, J 98.
_description: ‘How iudicare come in crede’ — in 8-line stanzas with this refrain

Lam491.First Lines:
…For þi self man þou may seeHow Iudicare come in
                    crede…
Lam491.Last Lines:
…Thus herd I a clerke þe soth exponeHow Iudicare com in
                    cred
Lam491.Editions:
Bülbring,  Karl Daniel. 
             “über die Handschrift Nr. 491 der Lambeth-Bibliothek.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         86 (1891): 383-92: 387-8.
Utley,  Francis Lee. 
             “How Judicare Came in the Creed.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         8 (1946): 303-9: 304-5.
